description: Performance Monitor Configuration for RT Process

cycle_timing.comment: RT cycle period is 1000us (1ms). Deadline is 900us (90% of cycle time) to allow margin for jitter.

monitoring.comment: Histogram tracks latency distribution. sample_buffer_size determines window for percentile calculations.

metrics.comment: Enable various performance metrics. Percentiles are calculated from sample buffer.

thresholds.comment: Performance thresholds for alerts. max_deadline_miss_rate_percent corresponds to SC-001 (< 0.01%).

prometheus.comment: Export metrics to Prometheus every export_interval_cycles (every 1000 cycles = 1 second at 1ms cycle time).

tracing.comment: Enable detailed tracing for debugging. Disabled by default to avoid RT overhead. log_interval_cycles = periodic stats logging.

advanced.comment: CycleGuard provides RAII-based cycle timing. Warmup cycles are excluded from statistics to avoid cold start effects.
